runs.comm: big roar from the crowd as he hurls a wide down the leg side
banged in short on middle, goes for the pull, is struck high on the pad and they get a leg bye
Jayasuriya off the mark in typical fashion, moves across, it's bowled on a good length on middle and leg, flicks it away over short fine for a boundary
on middle and off, dropped with soft hands in the vacant gap between square leg and midwicket, runs back hard for the second, good running
short of a good length outside off, nipped back into him to strike him high on the pads as he tried to play it into the leg side
shot off the pitch from a length outside off, tried to work it down to third man but was almost done in by the extra bounce
he's lucky, banged in short on middle, tries to tap it behind square, gets the top edge and it lands safe behind the keeper and short fine, they get two
just wide of the diving Kamran Akmal, short outside leg stump, moves across and helps it away past the diving keeper towards fine leg for a boundary
slower one bowled full outside off, picked it and pushed it wide of cover for a single
short of a length outside off, tries to chop it hard through point, it comes back in just a touch and keeps a little low, misses
swung back in, full on middle, tried to whack it past midwicket, got a thin inside edge onto his pads and towards short fine, gets a quick single
hurled it full outside off, landed in the blockhole, Udawatte could not get his bat down in time to dig it out
big swing from Udawatte, hurled straight on middle, tries to clear midwicket but gets an inside edge onto his pads, just a single
back of a length just outside off, goes for the pull, mistimes it wide of midwicket for just a single
superbly done, banged in short on middle, got into position early, moved across and pulled it away miles over fine leg for a massive six
angling it in towards the off stump, gets back and pushes it back to the bowler
slightly slower, bowled at 128.4 kmph, it's full outside off, charges down the track to cart him over cover, makes on contact as it cuts away

appeal for run out, cutting it back in towards the left hander, tries to clatter it over square leg, is struck high on the pads, calls for the single and Udawatte responds, Aamer picks it up and flicks it back onto the stumps at the striker's end but is it enough to beat Udawatte's dive? Was his bat in the air as he tried to drag it in? There's too much doubt, may have just had a part of the bat grounded but the replays were unconvincing. It's given not out.
overpitched this time and he is onto it immediately, creams it over the covers from the crease for a boundary
low full toss just outside off, chipped just over square leg for a couple of runs
slower one bowled at 108.8 kmph, goes for the pull over midwicket, doesn't pick it, it cuts away and he misses
oversteps and gives away a freehit, low full toss outside off, pushed back to the bowler

that's smashed, low full toss outside off, made the best use of the freehit, just a firm chip over the bowler's head and it landed just past the boundary, a six to the total, the chase is well and truly on
drops dead in front of the stumps as he tries to force it through the leg side and Udawatte responds well to complete the single in time

he's given him! Cut back in just outside leg stump towards middle and off, Udawatte was too late in trying to run it down behind point, was struck high on the pads but the umpire was convinced that was out, it pitched outside leg so that must take the lbw out of contention immediately
landed on a good length on the off, pushed towards mid-off on the front foot

Jayasuriya goes! Banged in short outside off, goes for the pull but doesn't connect it well, probably came on to him really quickly, got the top edge and Umar Akmal running to his right from fine leg completed a well-judged catch, it almost popped out but he got his fingers around it the second time round.
slightly short on the off, pushed into the off side between point and cover to get off the mark
angling it in to the left hander and getting it to move away just a hint, Sanga rocks back and defends it solidly to cover
sliding in towards leg stump, tries to work it away behind square, doesn't connect, is struck on the thighs
nicely played, hurled it short outside off, backed away just a little and upper-cut it towards third man for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, guided it off the back foot towards point
lovely shot, he chips down the track early to signal his intentions and carves it over extra cover, doesn't bother to run
attempts to clear the bowler this  time but mistimes the shot, just wide of Rao's reach and Ajmal does well to cut it off at mid-on
turns his wrists and clips him away wide of midwicket, Malik gives the chase and hurls it to the bowler;s end in one motion but the throw is wide
bends on one knee and tries to spank him past the covers but mistimes it
over the rope! Very little effort on that shot, he picks it from middle and nonchalantly flicks it over long leg, the timing carried it through
stands tall and knocks it down to point, that's 14 off the over
appeal for lbw, bowled it flat on on a good length outside off, spun back in to rap him on the pads as he went for the sweep, struck him outside the line
tossed it up outside off, coming round the wicket to the left-hander, pushed it gently past the bowler for a single
flighted outside off, lands full, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Sanga picks that superbly, bowled flat outside off but it's on a length, bends low and slog-sweeps that hard over midwicket for a boundary
pushed it firmly off the front foot to extra cover
full toss on the off stump, struck hard wide of long-on, Jayawardene calls for the second and runs well to make it back in time
too close to cut, went on straight from middle, chopped down to point
slower through the air, short and a little wide, bunts it down to deep cover for a single
spinning in from outside off, tucked away off the back foot to deep midwicket, thinks of a second but it's not there
short on middle, hit the pitch hard that time, punched off the back foot to extra cover
bowled it short on middle, Jayawardene rocked back and mistimed a pull to long-on for a single
tossed it up outside off, driven down to long-on for a single
length ball on middle and leg, worked away towards deep square leg for a single
banged in short on middle, the slower one bowled at 118.9 kmph, pulled away to deep square leg for just the single
slower one bowled full outside off, drilled down to long-off for just the one

leading edge and Razzaq takes it comfortable, angled in,  landed on a good length on middle and leg, Jayawardene tried to clip it over midwicket but was a little early into the shot and Razza  just had to move a few steps to his right at cover to cup that one
pushed away off the front foot to extra cover for a single
good running, slower one bowled short on middle, moves back and turns it behind square, gently, and comes back for the second
extra bounce as Sanga makes room to cut that away, misses
tucked away behind square for a single towards long leg
angling it in towards middle and leg, turned into the vacant leg-side field for an easy single
fired it full on the pads, Sanga drives it from the crease wide of long-on for a couple of runs, his bat's broken and he's called for a change.
slightly short on leg stump, turns it behind short fine for just the single
gets across to work that fullish delivery towards short fine for a single to keep the strike
short on middle and leg, whipped away off the back foot to deep square leg for a single
fires it full outside off, dug out into the ground towards extra cover for a single
quick, to his standards, bowled at 135.5 kmph, Kapugedara tries to run it past the keeper towards third man but it zips past the outside edge
straying on the pads this time, shortish on leg stump, misses out on the glace down fine, clips the pads and they get a leg bye
lands on a good length outside off, makes room and creams that down towards deep cover for a single
short on middle and off, kept a little low and struck Kapugedara in the zone as he tried to pull it square, he manages to salvage a leg bye
Sanga goes for it and almost holes out, it's tossed up outside off, chips it with little intent just short of long-off for a single
the quicker one fired in 126 kmph, it's full and outside off and Kapugedara can't get his bat to it

appeal for lbw, came from the back of the hand, Kapugedara took a couple of steps forward to work it into the leg side, was hit on the pads just in line with leg stump, Afridi breaks out into a big appeal but it's not upheld, looked mighty close
tossed up on the off, slog-swept down to deep midwicket for just the single
quicker, fuller, driven wide of long-on for a couple
tossed up and Kapugedara has a wild swing at it, tries to clear midwicket but the ball spins away sharply, he makes no contact, the pressure builds
Wonderfully timed, pitched it on a good length just a fraction outside off, Sanga was drawn out of his crease and he just lofted it cleanly over long-on for a pressure-relieving six, timely hit
slightly short outside off, tried to chop it down to third man, bowled at 137.7 kmph, missed it
hurled full outside off, slapped past the bowler, wide of long-off for a couple more
back of a length outside off, cut down to point to complete a quick single
shortish outside off, pulled away from the crease towards deep square leg for a single
bowled full and wide, dug out in front of point for a single to keep the strike, did well to recover after being struck for six first ball
goes after him first up, makes room to clear extra cover but it turns away to beat the swing of the bat
big blow! Tossed up outside off, much slower through the air, Sanga's eyes light up, goes for big slog-sweep over midwicket, gets an inside edge straight onto the stumps
pushed off the back foot towards midwicket
slightly short on middle, tucked away off the back foot behind square for a single
flat, spinning in from a good length outside off, taps it wide of cover for a single, just two off the over and a wicket, Pakistan are in control
bowled on a good length on middle, held its line, swung away towards Naved at deep midwicket for just a single
fires it down the leg side and is promptly called a wide
in the blockhole on middle, dug out in the direction of long-on for a single
another one down the leg side, misses the sweep  but he doesn't have to worry, gets a run and an extra ball

he's holed out! Quicker through the air, bowled full on middle, Kapugedara is tempted to deposit that into the stands, a desperate heave that, gets the top edge and Naved running in from deep midwicket judges it to perfection, tumbles to ensure he's held it firmly and then celebrates
full outside off, drilled down to long-off for a single
tossed it up just outside off, swipes it down towards deep midwicket for a single
full toss on the off stump, driven down to long-off for a single, just seven off the over and a wicket as well
on middle and leg, drifting in, pushed away into the deep on the leg side for a single
short of a length, cut away firmly to deep point for a single
gets it off the middle this time, tossed up outside off, charges down the track and smacks it over the bowler's head wide of long-off for a boundary

run-out, low full toss on middle, driven straight to Afridi at midwicket who fires in an accurate throw to the non-striker's end, scores a direct-hit and Angelo is short, Pakistan are on top, Sri Lanka are sliding
It's only a matter of time now, they've lost two in two. Tossed it up outside off, Kandamby chases it, tries to slice it over point but is unable to do so as Nazir times his jump well to pluck it
quicker through the air, fullish on middle and off, defended into the leg side
dropped, full toss on middle, driven hard back to Naved who spills it, was late to react, tried to juggle it but couldn't hold on
slower one on a good length outside off, pushed short of midwicket for a single
in the blockhole on middle and getting it to move in as well, dug out back to the bowler
low full toss outside off, bunts it down to wide long-off for a single
timber! The offcutter bowled slow, Kulasekara has a wild swing at it, is complete done in by the change in pace, misses and the ball crashes into middle and leg
full and wide, steers it down to third man from the crease for a single
tossed up outside off, spun away as he tried to sweep it square, missed
flighted outside off, slog-swept just wide of deep midwicket for a single
Murali falls, tossed up on the off stump, makes room and lofts it straight to Umar Akmal positioned perfectly at long-on, takes it easily, Ajmal gets his third
flights it outside off, turns away sharply, Thushara tries to heave it over midwicket, misses
quicker through the air on middle and off, swipes it down to deep midwicket for one run
drifts it in towards off stump, is met by a solid defense from the No.11 batsman
bowled on a good length on leg stump, tries to slog it towards midwicket, misses it completely and hears the death rattle!
